name: Jeff Blaz
text: Fantastic customer service! Ingredients always fresh, well prepared and food always cooked just right! This location is amazing and I always make sure to stop by for my usual take two, which the team members have already memorized by heart. ‚Ä¶More

name: James Di Giacomo
text: Great place to get vegan pizza. The pizza is decent, the service could be better, especially when you see 8 people behind the counter and no one in front of you in line and yet you have to wait like 10 mins to place your order. Also a HUGE ‚Ä¶More

name: Freeman Beauchamp
text: This place is so delicious. You can pick and choose any and every topping you can think or dream of. The atmosphere is great. Can be a bit noisy but for the introvert crowd, there's a closed in area where you can enjoy your pie if it's not crowded. Overall a fun and tasty experience.

name: Shayan Shahabi
text:
Great tasting pizza. I will def revisit this joint!  The pizza was tasty and toasted.  The extra cheese on top made it a even better tasting.
If you are at Topanga mall you should for sure give blaze pizza a try.

name: Elvira M
text: Yummy in my tummy!! Delicious pizza and great staff! A little bit more expensive than Pizza Rev but worth it.

name: Brenda Wooten Porter
text: if I could give more than 5 stars I would!!  we were flying out to come back to Atlanta the next day...so I'm so GLAD we came on Saturday evening, June 17, 2017!!   this is by far the BEST pizza we've EVER had!!!  it was sooo nice and ‚Ä¶More

name: Paulo M√°rquez Herrero
text: Great Pizza made with all-natural ingredients. Pick from a list of tasty choices or build your own, all extra ingredients come under just one price. Service is fast and friendly, prices are very reasonable, specially when you consider the top quality you get when coming to Blaze Pizza.

name: Lynn Austin
text: Delicious pizza, always fresh.

name: L T
text: The keto and cauliflower crusts are for an extra $2 or $3. Cauliflower crust wasn't bad, actually tasted pretty good. I felt I paid more for my meal at Blaze with the same crust compared to  other similar pizza places. I also felt my pizza could've been hotter.

name: Hector Aguayo
text:
Luv the choices in crusts. Awesome service. Employees were on point. Especially this one kid. Keep it up!
They did run out of Keto crusts ‚òπÔ∏è

name: A N
text: Keto pizza is awesome. Almost no carbs. Guilt free.

name: Charlene P
text: The staff was friendly and the pizza is amazing. Their crust is vegan and their gluten free option is also vegan! They have Daiya cheese for the pure vegans and tons of veggie options!! I highly recommend this place for those with restricted diets.

name: Roland Godinez
text: Great custom made pizza - fast organic healthier choice.

name: NICO9000
text: Always a good pizza at a great price. Have been to this particular Blaze location many times and never had a bad meal. I've been to several other Blaze's in different SoCal cities and they are uniformly consistent in the quality and value of the food.

name: Meryl Moran
text: Pretty amazing restaurant. This place was recommended to me and I'm glad I tried it. Food is very flavorful and the pizzas are huge! I'm definitely coming back to try more of the menu items.

name: Danny King
text: They have vegan cheese too! Hot thin pizza with whatever you want on it. Friendly staff and quick pizza.

name: George Martinez
text: My girlfriend and I frequent this place mainly because of the workers and the music. Shout out to Gia! Oh, and the pizza is delicious

name: De Mann
text: Really good pizza. Many toppings to choose from though I consider myself a pizza traditionalist (only true pizza toppings ie sausage mushroom pepperoni). They're classic sauce has a very good flavor and I'm interested in trying their ‚Ä¶More

text: Amazing...way better than MOD pizza and Pie 5

name: Mariela Sanchez
text: First time going, definitely going back! Great customer service, delicious pizza with gluten free and vegan options, and prices are fair. Oh and their garlic knots are so good, they're cheesy and not too much garlic

name: George Gomez
text: Great pizza for price can't beat it

name: Victor Lopez
text:
This pizza place has everything. Mozzarella cheese? Check. Ham, chicken, sausage? Check. Veggies, pesto sauce, olive oil ? Check and yummy desserts like smores, brownies and also drinks to quench your thirst, after eating all that pizza.
It is inside the mall, but also has outdoor indoor seating

name: Sean G. Rosenstock
text: While I am not a fan of the pizza - I found some of the ingredients to be not the best or freshest, and overall just too oily and salty for my taste..the service itself was refreshing friendly and polite. So, it is counter serve.. you pick ‚Ä¶More

name: Julie J
text: I just started going to this place because I have a family member who is doing KETO and they had a KETO friendly crust. I like their regular crust. Their service was good. They have a good variety of salads, pizza toppings, desert and drinks. If you like pieology you'll also enjoy Blaze! Give them a try!

name: Kayleigh Herrmann
text: Wow! I was able to make my own delicious pizza. It was super cool because you tell them what you want and they make the pizza right in front of you. Then they put your pizza in a open stove that has flames and takes like 1 minute to cook. üçï üçï üçï

name: Jasmine Ides
text: We had heard that blaze has a new keto/low carb crust so we decided to give it a try. When we asked the girl if they had it, she seemed to have no clue that it was even a thing that they were offering. We just got regular crust. ‚Ä¶More

text: Your standard build your own pizza joint. Only reason it would not taste good is if you put weird toppings on it.

Its okay..it could be a lot better..cleaner..less in a hurry..
Oven is a little to hot and crust burns before toppings can cook thoroughly..got sick 50 percent of time. The dough needs more time to rise and set better.toppings are not spread out evenly and the its all in a clump in the middle..raw.

name: Alison Desantis
text: It is great pizza. Nice people that work there.

name: Brandon Lippincott
text: Blaze pizza is located on the ground floor in the Topanga mall beneath the food court, right by the escalators. You can customize your own pizza, and they take great care to accommodate allergies too. A great place to get gluten-free pizza too!

name: Kenbob
text: AWESOME as all the other Blaze like AnnArbor Mi. Great choices, fun to be a part of your meal. Quick & friendly...

name: Edward Kim
text:
Great service, and honestly can't go wrong with their pizzas. Plenty of seating, and their selection of drinks are worth trying.
Note: the cup lids are located to the right of the drink dispenser- far right, at the edge of the counter (was a bit hard to find)

name: David Holt
text: If you want a pizza made to your exact liking this is the spot.

name: Ryan Horan
